block.p: BERGEN COUNTY, N.J. 3 a.m. to 6 a.m. tomorrow
BERGEN COUNTY, N.J. 3 a.m. to 6 a.m. tomorrow

Edgewater, Cliffside Park and Fairview, Ridgefield, Leonia, Ridgefield Park, Bogota, Cresskill, Alpine, Englewood Cliffs, Englewood, Bergenfield, Teaneck and Tenafly 3 a.m. to 6 a.m. Thursday Hasbrouck Heights, Lodi, Teterboro, South Hackensack, Little Ferry, Hackensack, Garfield, Elmwood Park, Fair Lawn, Rochelle Park, Saddle Brook and Maywood.

10 p.m. today to 5 a.m. tomorrow Mount Eden, Morris Heights, University Heights, Kingsbridge Heights, Fordham, Tremont, East Tremont, Bedford Park, Belmont, Bronxdale, Pelham Parkway, Bronx Park, Mount Hope, Bathgate, Claremont Village, West Farms, Crotona Park East, Bronx River, Bruckner, Morrisania, Longwood, Parkchester, Olinville, Norwood and Jerome Park.

FOR INFORMATION New York City (877) 968-4692 Nassau County (516) 571-2500 Suffolk County (631) 852-4939 Rockland County (845) 364-8990 Westchester County (914) 637-2420 Connecticut (860) 424-4184 Note: Spraying schedules are subject to change in the event of rain. (Source: Health departments)
